items.sentence: We aren't even close to having a workable plan.
Tom asked me all kinds of questions about Mary.
There's a rest area about three miles up ahead.

Tom should've told Mary about what he had done.
Tom should've told Mary what needed to be done.
Tom still hasn't done what he's supposed to do.
Tom said he wanted to finish what he was doing.
I think Tom may have been the one who did this.
Tom was renting a house in Boston at that time.
I'd definitely go there tomorrow if I were you.
These are the speakers that I bought last week.

Tom is the only one here who's smarter than me.

The dogs aren't supposed to sleep in the house.
